name: New Confluence Light Dark
description: Comfortable gray background for confluence with some minor tweaks to text and other parts Based on Confluence Light Dark by Jayd Wells Compatible with Confluence 6.15 Appears to be incompatible with Confluence 7! Some minor problems still exist (please comment where, i'll try to fix them or send me your patched code, if you patched it)
additional_info:
September 16th, 2019: Jira Issue Macro and Jira-Link button should now appear dark

July 9th, 2019: Text comments now appear dark

June 21st, 2019: Pagetree links should be more visible now, some color adjustments

June 17th, 2019: Fixed some color issues within the macro editor

June 3rd, 2019: Fixed notification with white background and bright "unread"-color

discussions.name: Appears incompatible with the latest redesign of Confluence-at least for me, but prob. for everyone.
